revision.text: {{talkheader}} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Aviation|class=Start |B-Class-1= |B-Class-2= |B-Class-3= |B-Class-4= |B-Class-5= |Biography=yes}} {{WikiProject Biography|living=no|class=Start|listas=Green (Battle of Britain pilot), Bill|military-work-group=yes|military-priority=Low|needs-photo=yes}} {{WikiProject Military History|class=Start|B1=n|B2=n|B3=y|B4=y|B5=n|Aviation=yes|Biography=yes|British=yes|WWII=yes}} {{WikiProject United Kingdom|class=Start|importance=Low}} }} {{British English|date=September 2010}} ==Untitled== For future reference retired Royal Air force Officers can only use their rank if they reached the substantive rank of Squadron Leader.[[Special:Contributions/188.65.178.160|188.65.178.160]] ([[User talk:188.65.178.160|talk]]) 03:52, 31 August 2010 (UTC) == Notable? == What makes this person specially notable over the thousands of pilots who were shot down and survived in WWII? —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/84.123.157.156|84.123.157.156]] ([[User talk:84.123.157.156|talk]]) 17:52, 29 September 2010 (UTC) == Tried to improve Article == I've tried to improve the article a little bit because I felt it was a little mess. If anyone can improve it better than I can, then by all means do it. What needs to be found somewhere is when he was born and where, even try and find an picture/image of him in his uniform. [[User:Adamdaley|Adamdaley]] ([[User talk:Adamdaley|talk]]) 01:10, 24 January 2011 (UTC) Whoever created this article and helped creat it thanks! Most of the famous pilot's who flew in the Battle Of Britain have there own page but 97% of Fighter Command was up of Pilots like him, each one of "The Few" deserves to have his story told I only hope one day that will be so. P.S. to the author of this article: can you tell us his post Battle of Britain Air Force Career? —Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/99.249.33.137|99.249.33.137]] ([[User talk:99.249.33.137|talk]]) 19:21, 16 February 2011 (UTC) == Birth date == The fact that anything relating to birth date or age is just mentioned as "(aged 93-4)" is a slight problem. If anybody can find his birth date and put it in the infobox, that'd be good. [[User:Niudla|Niudla]] ([[User talk:Niudla|talk]]) 09:50, 26 July 2012 (UTC)
